level.heading: Issuance of license.
level.text: ยง 20-485.2 Issuance of license. A license to maintain or operate an electronics store shall be granted in accordance with the provisions of this subchapter and any rules promulgated by the commissioner thereunder. The commissioner may refuse to issue to an applicant any license required under this subchapter based upon a determination made after due notice and opportunity to be heard that such applicant has engaged in conduct which would constitute a basis for license suspension or revocation as set forth in section 20-485.3 of this subchapter.
